article:
The search function allows to search element in the currently seelected model. The options for th Search are:
Selecting the type of elements to search (by default the Search looks for all types of elements)
Specifying the name of element to search
The types of elements which can be selected are:
All elements (the default)
Classes
Properties (including data properties or object properties)
Data properties
Object properties
Individuals
The search String allows to define the string to search for. The "*" character in the string is used fort any sequence of characters. For exemple:
"tutu" search to exactly the string "tutu"
"*tutu" could work for "tutu", "aaBtutu", etc...
By default the Search is case sensitive but you can uncheck the option to make it case-insensitive
It is also possible to use the String as a regular expression
After clicking on the "Yes" button, the Search is perfoemed, and a Search results wind appear. For example with:
You might have the following window:
Selecting any element in the result window will highlight the selected element in the model.
